body: {"scenes": [{"scn": "1", "i/e": "INT", "loc": "OFICINA DE ARQUITECTURA", "set": "OFICINA EMILIO", "d/n": "DAY", "sd": "7", "yr": "", "cast": ["EMILIO", "RICARDO"], "extras": [], "el": {"PROPS": [], "SET DRESSING": [], "WARDROBE": [], "MAKEUP": [], "VEHICLES": [], "ANIMALS": [], "SOUNDS": [], "VFX": [], "SFX": [], "SPECIAL EQUIPMENT": [], "MUSIC": [], "OTHERS": []}, "sub_scenes": [], "synopsis": "Ricardo irrumpe en la oficina de Emilio para confrontarlo por su posible partida a Sudáfrica y exigirle que done su riñón a Julieta. La tensión crece entre ambos mientras Ricardo se sincera sobre sus sentimientos y temores por la salud de Julieta.", "geo_location": null}, {"scn": "2", "i/e": "EXT", "loc": "HOTEL TULUM", "set": "PLAYA", "d/n": "DAY", "sd": "7", "yr": "", "cast": ["VICTORIA", "JULIETA", "NACHO", "DANIEL"], "extras": ["CHAVOS", "CHAVAS"], "el": {"PROPS": ["BOTANAS", "CÓCTELES", "AGUA"]}, "sub_scenes": [], "synopsis": "Victoria, Julieta y Nacho conversan y comen en la playa, explorando tensiones familiares. Nacho, con una dinámica, ayuda a Julieta a ver la perspectiva de su madre. Daniel llega con más jóvenes y los invita a continuar la fiesta.", "geo_location": "TULUM"}, {"scn": "3", "i/e": "INT", "loc": "HOSPITAL", "set": "PASILLO", "d/n": "DAY", "sd": "7", "yr": "", "cast": ["MACA"], "extras": ["ENFERMERAS (2)"], "el": {"PROPS": [], "SET DRESSING": [], "WARDROBE": [], "MAKEUP": [], "VEHICLES": [], "ANIMALS": [], "SOUNDS": [], "VFX": [], "SFX": [], "SPECIAL EQUIPMENT": [], "MUSIC": [], "PHOTOS": [], "OTHERS": []}, "sub_scenes": [{"scn": "3.01", "i/e": "INT", "loc": "HOSPITAL", "set": "VOZ OFF", "d/n": "DAY", "sd": "7", "yr": "", "cast": ["JULIETA"], "extras": [], "el": {"PROPS": [], "SET DRESSING": [], "WARDROBE": [], "MAKEUP": [], "VEHICLES": [], "ANIMALS": [], "SOUNDS": [], "VFX": [], "SFX": [], "SPECIAL EQUIPMENT": [], "MUSIC": [], "PHOTOS": [], "OTHERS": []}, "synopsis": "Julieta se escucha en voz over comentando sobre la lealtad de su jefa, en relación a Maca."}, {"scn": "3.02", "i/e": "INT", "loc": "HOSPITAL", "set": "OFICINA DEL DIRECTOR", "d/n": "DAY", "sd": "7", "yr": "", "cast": ["MACA"], "extras": [], "el": {"PROPS": [], "SET DRESSING": [], "WARDROBE": [], "MAKEUP": [], "VEHICLES": [], "ANIMALS": [], "SOUNDS": [], "VFX": [], "SFX": [], "SPECIAL EQUIPMENT": [], "MUSIC": [], "PHOTOS": [], "OTHERS": []}, "synopsis": "Maca entra decidida a la oficina del director impulsada por su furia."}], "synopsis": "Maca recorre decidida el pasillo del hospital bajo la mirada de dos enfermeras y entra furiosa a la oficina del director, mientras escuchamos la voz en off de Julieta.", "geo_location": null}]}
